class.name: GodotcordOverlayManager
class.brief_description: A wrapper of the Discord Game SDK Overlay Manager.
class.description: A wrapper of the Discord Game SDK Activity Manager. This class is used to interface with the ingame discord overlay.

method.name: is_enabled
method.description: Returns whether the overlay is enabled

method.name: is_locked
method.description: Returns whether the overlay is locked

method.name: open_voice_settings
method.description: Signals the overlay to open the voice settings.

method.name: open_activity_invite
method.description: Opens a dialog to send activity invites to user, channels, groups, ...

method.name: open_build_invite
method.description: Opens the "Join a guild" dialog with the specified invite code.

signal.name: profile_picture_callback
signal.description: Emitted when a profile picture has been fetched. The image data is returned as a byte array in [code]image_data[/code]. See the example on how to convert the raw image data into a texture to use it in Godot.
